sense.name: spiritual leader or guide
sense.examples: Mary studied with a guru in India for two years. A religious guru in Oregon was indicted for tax evasion. Our guru encouraged us to meditate every day and become vegetarians.

sense.name: an expert in a knowledge domain
sense.examples: Several gurus of game development will be at the conference. They've called in some marketing gurus to help with the product launch. I am no Unix guru, but I do know a few useful commands.
